channel.title: First Ever Halo Signature [v2]
channel.description:
Well... I have seen all these signatures with that halo guy in them, so I decided to try one.
[img]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/4497/alexiahaloqo2.png[/img]
[b]Constructive criticism[/b] is appreciated. If you want to post anything else in my thread, don't.
---
Alright... after review of the constructive criticism and a few personal ideas, I have made the signature a little bit better:
[b]V.2[/b] [img]http://img149.imageshack.us/img149/4333/alexiahalolf3.png[/img]
-Alexia

item.title: First Ever Halo Signature [v2]
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:15, topic:46155”]Okay, I don’t like removing posts, because it wastes my time.

Silver Lining - That wasn’t constructive criticism. Stop the flaming, because this is the second time I have had to say something about it.

Alexia - You didn’t have to respond that way, really. Just ignore it. Responding is also part of the problem.

therealjdb - Wasn’t really needed ;)[/quote]
what? I cant comment? :o sorry

Read full topic

item.title: First Ever Halo Signature [v2]
item.dc:creator: @Zigon Zigon
item.description:
@Zigon wrote:

Woah Alexia, its just some constructive criticism
lol, constructive criticism "Don't make a sig again. Ever.".

I personally can’t stand the colors you chose and I thought it lacked detail (by detail I mean I don’t like the brush you used), also the font could have been clearer. I’m not saying I could do much better but theres my 2 cents, 3/10.

Read full topic

item.title: First Ever Halo Signature [v2]
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

Never make a renders opacity lower… Just never… If you want to blend it in get a color from the sig make a new layer , and use the magic wand to highlight your render then fill it in with the color from the sig and switch it to color at the opacity you like.

Read full topic

item.title: First Ever Halo Signature [v2]
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

Of course the original colors don’t show… they don’t exist anymore.

Ctrl + U

-Alexia

Read full topic

item.title: First Ever Halo Signature [v2]
item.dc:creator: @Vahuka Vahuka
item.description:
@Vahuka wrote:

i don’t like the render being semi-transparent and the original colours can’t show very well, sorry but it’s a 6/10 for me

item.title: First Ever Halo Signature [v2]

item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

I’m still not liking it. Try multi coloring with YellowyBrown and BrownyGreen.

item.title: First Ever Halo Signature [v2]
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

How does it seem blocky?

Anyways… I agree with the part about the pink being bad, but I don’t like signatures with just one color, so I am going to try it with a blue and see how it works. I am also going to make a few other improvements that are secret.

I will post the new one up when I am done.

-Alexia[br][size=1]Posted on: January 10, 2007, 08:53:26 AM[/size][hr]Alright… there we go.

Read full topic

item.title: First Ever Halo Signature [v2]
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Yuck. I’m sorry, but I dislike it. The colours don’t go well, and it seems almost ‘blocky’. Maybe you should take a few tutorials on how to blend.

The text is good, the ‘ALEXIA’ text anyway.

The signature would look much better if you picked the right colours.

Rating - 4/10

Read full topic

item.title: First Ever Halo Signature [v2]
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

Good Job Alexia!

Maybe use more colors that blend with the render…

Maybe move the ‘Alexia’ seeing as it has no flow really so I would move it above X-Cel.
Pink is not needed in my opinion. It would look better with just the green.
Add some flow.

Trying to give some

[b]Constructive criticism [/b]

Read full topic
